heisigComment: * Used as a primitive this kanji means only chariot.
heisigStory: The crowned vehicle depicted here is a "chariot," symbol of an army.
koohiiStory1: British army cars are at the service of the crown.
koohiiStory2: Imagine a crown is the hood ornament on every army car.
myStory: quân đội. xe cho vào mái che ngụy trang.
words:
軍(いくさ): war, battle, campaign, fight
軍艦(ぐんかん): warship, battleship
軍事(ぐんじ): military affairs
軍備(ぐんび): armaments, military preparations
軍服(ぐんぷく): military or naval uniform
軍(ぐん): army, force, troops
軍隊(ぐんたい): army, troops
